message:
Job opportunity in one of most visited Websites in Egypt

Senior Web Developer needed for a high-profile start-up.  Candidate will assume full technical responsibility of software development for one of the region's most visited websites.  Our technology includes a front-end capable of serving millions of users / month, and a highly sophisticated back-end that performs crawling, trained classification, language-independent topic extraction, etc.  We spend 40% of our time enhancing the user experience, 40% investing in core technology, and 20% on pure experimentation.

Qualifications:
* BSc in Computer Engineering or Computer Science
* 3+ years experience in software development
* Familiarity with Ruby on Rails and MySQL (required), Solr and web servers (preferred)
* Experience with distributed processing of large volumes of data preferred
* Experience with AI and language-independent, statistical text processing preferred

Send your CV to jobs (at) Tahrir2.com
